page.title: 18WHITEHEATH SCHOOL RUISLIP
page.content: Whiteheath Junior School has just had a new block built with 6 classrooms 2 resource areas,a group room,stockrooms and cloakrooms.The classrooms all have outside covered areas, spotlighting, film screens, a carpet and hessian covered walls.Originally the school was a primary but the infant is now a separate school and the hut classrooms have been demolished.The school lost two teachers through redeployment in the last two years.It has 4 1st/2nd yr vertical groups and 4 3rd/4ths. There are many clubs archery,popmobility,gym 4 recorder groups,computer,science,art boys and girls football,orchestra,net- ball,chess,choir,guitar and{Domesday {which did the amenties count + typing. I lived for 6 years in Saudia Arabia. I think Whiteheath has a nice approach and I enjoy it very much.At 250 pupils it is smaller than my other schools.
